creator: Pixe Studio
descriptionHtml:
Pipe Game is a typical tile puzzle with a cool challenging twist. Move the sliding tiles to unblock a path for the ball to roll to the exit. Enjoy the delight of seeing the ball roll flatly through the connected tiles to the end.

Are you ready to roll?

Features of Pipe Ball Game


Brain Training app game to improve your agility and hand-eye coordination!
FREE and simple addicting puzzle game
Thousands of challenging LEVELS to solve! Get sliding!
No time limits!
Bonus coins available upon completing each level.

HOW TO PLAY

Slide tiles to create a linking path for the ball to roll to the GOAL!
Set a new record by making the perfect 3-star rating.
